com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.constraints.definitions

Class ConstraintDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.constraints.definitions.ConstraintDefinition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstraintDefinitionIK, ConstraintDefinitionMaintainVolume, ConstraintDefinitionTransLike

    public abstract class ConstraintDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for all constraint definitions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConstraintDefinition

        public ConstraintDefinition(Structure constraintData,
                            java.lang.Long ownerOMA,
                            BlenderContext blenderContext)
        Loads a constraint definition based on the constraint definition structure.
        Parameters:
        constraintData - the constraint definition structure
        ownerOMA - the constraint's owner OMA
        blenderContext - the blender context

    • Method Detail

      • setConstraintName

        public void setConstraintName(java.lang.String constraintName)

      • isTrackToBeChanged

        public boolean isTrackToBeChanged()
        Returns:
        determines if the definition of the constraint will change the bone in any way; in most cases it is possible to tell that even before the constraint baking simulation is started, so we can discard such bones from constraint computing to improve the computation speed and lower the computations complexity

      • isTargetRequired

        public abstract boolean isTargetRequired()
        Returns:
        determines if this constraint definition requires a defined target or not

      • getOwner

        protected java.lang.Object getOwner()
        This method is here because we have no guarantee that the owner is loaded when constraint is being created. So use it to get the owner when it is needed for computations.
        Returns:
        the owner of the constraint or null if none is set

      • getOwnerTransform

        protected Transform getOwnerTransform(ConstraintHelper.Space ownerSpace)
        The method gets the owner's transformation. The owner can be either bone or spatial.
        Parameters:
        ownerSpace - the space in which the computed transformation is given
        Returns:
        the constraint owner's transformation

      • applyOwnerTransform

        protected void applyOwnerTransform(Transform ownerTransform,
                                   ConstraintHelper.Space ownerSpace)
        The method applies the given transformation to the owner.
        Parameters:
        ownerTransform - the transformation to apply to the owner
        ownerSpace - the space that defines which owner's transformation (ie. global, local, etc. will be set)

      • isImplemented

        public boolean isImplemented()
        Returns:
        true if the definition is implemented and false otherwise

      • getAlteredOmas

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> getAlteredOmas()
        Returns:
        a list of all OMAs of the features that the constraint had altered beside its owner

      • getConstraintTypeName

        public abstract java.lang.String getConstraintTypeName()
        Returns:
        the type name of the constraint

      • bake

        public abstract void bake(ConstraintHelper.Space ownerSpace,
                          ConstraintHelper.Space targetSpace,
                          Transform targetTransform,
                          float influence)
        Bakes the constraint for the current feature (bone or spatial) position.
        Parameters:
        ownerSpace - the space where owner transform will be evaluated in
        targetSpace - the space where target transform will be evaluated in
        targetTransform - the target transform used by some of the constraints
        influence - the influence of the constraint from range [0; 1]

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
